front.title: Requirements for XML Messaging Version 1.0 Release 00

abstract.t: This specification contains requirements for a generic approach tothe reliable, resilient, secure, tamper resistant, authenticatedexchange of XML or other electronic documents over insecure transportmechanisms.The specification provides the requirements and framework for a setof related specifications on XML Messaging covering:o Requirements for XML Messaging (this paper)o Common XML Message Elementso Document Exchange and Transactionso Reliable Messagingo Secure Messagingo Document Choreography Definitionso Common Document Exchangeso Transport Protocol SupplementsAlthough much work has been carried out on the other parts of the XMLMessaging specification described above, they are sill in development
